name: High-Resolution Lossless Media File
summary: A MOVPKG file is a high-resolution, lossless media file downloaded using Apple Music or TV. It is a package that contains several .frag files and .XML files, and an .M3U8 file. Apple Music downloads MOVPKG files to play high-resolution, lossless audio, while Apple TV downloads MOVPKG files to play high-resolution, lossless movies and TV episodes.
